title: Spotted at Nordstrom: Chic Basics and Shoes I Know Stylish People Will Want in Their Closets
description: Cool tops, skirts, sandals, sneakers, and more.
excerpt: Cool tops, skirts, sandals, sneakers, and more.
text: Nordstrom's latest spring drops have been filled with outstanding pieces. I've shared edits of the standouts, and yes, I'm here to share even more. This time, I'm focusing on the chic basics I found. I'm referring to those versatile pieces that can be styled in different ways and are easy yet modern. I also mixed in some of my favorite spring and summer shoe styles for more shopping inspiration.Keep scrolling to shop the best basics and shoes at Nordstrom, which I know stylish people (including my fashion friends) would say yes to. You'll find everything from pretty skirts and blouses to cool sneakers and gorgeous sandals. Open Edit Linen Blend Vest A linen vest will make any look feel instantly chicer. Citizens of Humanity Brynn Drawstring High Waist Wide Leg Jeans Open Edit Tori Kitten Heel Sandal Editors love these sandals. Open Edit Everyday One-Button Linen Blend Blazer You'll get so much wear out of this blazer. adidas Tokyo Low Top Suede Sneaker Open Edit Everyday Pleated Linen Blend Shorts Reformation Hudson Knit Tank Topshop Curved Hem Fitted Stretch Cotton T-Shirt Sam Edelman Michaela Mary Jane Flat Levi's Ribcage High Waist Wide Leg Jeans Open Edit Sleeveless Linen Blend Minidress Dress this piece up or down. Marc Fisher Amelea Flip Flop Another amazing pair of heeled flip-flops. Polo Ralph Lauren Lightweight Fleece Polo This polo will sell out fast. Nordstrom Stretch Cotton Ribbed Tank Dress A "throw on and go" dress. Tube tops will be so popular this summer. Vince Barcelona Jelly Cage Mule Get these mules before they're gone. Nordstrom Lace Trim Bias Cut Midi Skirt The lace trim is very relevant. NAADAM The Original Cashmere Sweater A lightweight sweater is great for chillier nights. These sneakers are in the closets of many fashion people. Cotton On Haven Wide Leg Pant Reformation Rylie Notched Rib Sweater Tank Jeffrey Campbell Beach Day Jelly Flip Flop Wear these flip-flops at the beach or with baggy jeans. Eileen Fisher Classic Collar Organic Linen Long Button-Up Shirt AllSaints Katarina Stretch Cotton Tank Good American Good Standard Raw Hem Denim Bermuda Shorts I always love denim shorts with a raw hem. This jacket comes in a few colors. Tony Bianco Christine Slingback Sandal Pistola High Waist Wide Leg Jeans Wear these shoes with the above jeans. Bobby Schuessler is a fashion editor with over a decade of editorial experience covering shopping, style, and beauty. He's spent 10 years at Who What Wear, currently leading the market team to deliver highly covetable and convertible content. He creates data-driven shopping guides featuring top retailers like Nordstrom, Shopbop, and Net-a-Porter and is at the forefront of Who What Wear's shopping tentpole strategies, including Amazon Prime Day. He also works on branded content initiatives and appears on camera in video and shopping livestream franchises.
html:
Nordstrom's latest spring drops have been filled with outstanding pieces. I've shared edits of the standouts, and yes, I'm here to share even more. This time, I'm focusing on the chic basics I found. I'm referring to those versatile pieces that can be styled in different ways and are easy yet modern. I also mixed in some of my favorite spring and summer shoe styles for more shopping inspiration.

Keep scrolling to shop the best basics and shoes at Nordstrom, which I know stylish people (including my fashion friends) would say yes to. You'll find everything from pretty skirts and blouses to cool sneakers and gorgeous sandals.

Open Edit

Linen Blend Vest

A linen vest will make any look feel instantly chicer.

Citizens of Humanity

Brynn Drawstring High Waist Wide Leg Jeans

Open Edit

Tori Kitten Heel Sandal

Editors love these sandals.

Open Edit

Everyday One-Button Linen Blend Blazer

You'll get so much wear out of this blazer.

Another amazing pair of heeled flip-flops.

Nordstrom

A "throw on and go" dress.

Tube tops will be so popular this summer.

Get these mules before they're gone.

The lace trim is very relevant.

A lightweight sweater is great for chillier nights.

This jacket comes in a few colors.

Bobby Schuessler is a fashion editor with over a decade of editorial experience covering shopping, style, and beauty. He's spent 10 years at Who What Wear, currently leading the market team to deliver highly covetable and convertible content. He creates data-driven shopping guides featuring top retailers like Nordstrom, Shopbop, and Net-a-Porter and is at the forefront of Who What Wear's shopping tentpole strategies, including Amazon Prime Day. He also works on branded content initiatives and appears on camera in video and shopping livestream franchises.
